17 April 2010

A Perfect Day

by Aaron Lord

It started out with a smoothie for her and a Dutch freeze for me.

Then we went to Wildwood Park and took in a little league game.

And played in the dirt.

And saw a fire engine.

Then we headed up the hill towards Deer Creek to kick in the tires in the new Raumw√ºnder. Oh man was that fun! Like I said, a perfect day.

She was asleep by 12:30.

There's still snow at the top of the ridge!

Deer Creek, just across the orange bridge.

I think the flavor fell short of her expectations.

Back in the car.

Hi!
